meanings: bad[nasty, foul] smell, (informal) stink, (썩는 냄새) stench

vlive.korean: 악취는 없습니다. No armpit odor. 듣기 View video 밀리언마켓 : 우태운의 '해주세요' 1화(먹방 :족보)
그리고 이병헌 씨, 거기 위치 자체가 악취가 날 수밖에 없는 위치였다고... Lee Byung Hun, I heard that the location was bound to smell a lot. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : 이병헌+강동원+김우빈 <마스터> 무비토크 라이브 ' Movie Talk Live'
vlive.english: Lee Byung Hun, I heard that the location was bound to smell a lot.

vlive.korean: 어땠나요? 더위, 습도, 악취 이 세 가지가 힘들었다고. How was it? I heard that you had a difficult time from the heat, humidity, and the smell. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : 이병헌+강동원+김우빈 <마스터> 무비토크 라이브 ' Movie Talk Live'
vlive.english: How was it? I heard that you had a difficult time from the heat, humidity, and the smell.
